title: Can I get another option ?
body: Got Challenger Ahri and it's not letting me purchase her...

replies.body: ive watched alot of people send tickets and nothing be done by riot at all

Hey man,

If you send in a support ticket explaining the situation, they should be able to get you challenger ahri at the price listed in your snowdown store. Apologies for the error on that specific skin.
How long is it likely to take to get a response on the support ticket? I encountered the same problem and have submitted a ticket.
im having the same problem with the same skin, thought it was just me
